Text:
I do this: 

avi/mp4/MKV files:

HDMI cable between my computer and LGTV, set resolution to 1920 x 1080 and play the movie in VLC media player. Full screen, than Turn 3D on. (3d side by side)

Other:

Download daemon tools 
Mount the movie in Daemon tools.
Install CyberLink PowerDVD 11

Play the movie with this program.

Works great for me!
